tn.ref: insects that walk on four legs
tn.text: Here the phrase "four legs" is an idiom that means to crawl on the ground and sets these insects apart from other flying things, such as birds, that have only two feet. AT: "insects that crawl on the ground" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
